definition: Jin Yong, pen name of Louis Cha (1924-2018), wuxia 武俠|武侠[wu3 xia2] novelist, author of the 1957-1961 Condor Trilogy
surname Jin/surname Kim (Korean)/Jurchen Jin dynasty (1115-1234)
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
ordinary/to use

sentences.english: Jin Yong is famous as a writer.
sentences.chinese: 金庸作为一名作家而著名。

sentences.english: I'm very familiar with all the well-known characters from Jin Yong's novels.
sentences.chinese: 金庸小说中著名的角色我全了如指掌。

sentences.english: Jinyong is a writer of distinction.
sentences.chinese: 金庸是一名优秀的作家。

sentences.english: In Jinyong s novels there are massive cave images.
sentences.chinese: 金庸小说中存在着大量的山洞意象。

sentences.english: I'm reading Jin Yong's Legend of the Condor Heroes right now and I'm enjoying it (as did you).
sentences.chinese: 我在读金庸的《射雕英雄传》，我也很喜欢。

sentences.english: The film is a parody of the novel The Legend of the Condor Heroes by Louis Cha.
sentences.chinese: 该片是金庸武侠小说《射雕英雄传》的恶搞版。

sentences.english: The original writer of the book is Jinyong.
sentences.chinese: 这本书的原作者是金庸。

sentences.english: The book I randomly picked up was a kung fu novel by Louis Cha, a famous Hong Kong writer.
sentences.chinese: 我随便捡了一本，是香港著名作家金庸写的武侠小说。

sentences.english: All these explain the humanism spirit hiding deep in Jin Yong's heart.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些都说明了金庸深藏于心底的人道主义精神。

sentences.english: I like Kungfu novels by Louis Cha.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢金庸的武侠小说。

sentences.english: Jin Yong is more literary, which sometimes may get a bit too heavy handed IMHO.
sentences.chinese: 金庸更文艺，恕我直言有时太过文艺。

sentences.english: The novels by Jinyong are the best sellers among the literature works in Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 金庸小说是当代最为畅销的汉语文学作品。

sentences.english: I think Xiaolongnv is the most beautiful girl.
sentences.chinese: 你认为谁是金庸笔下最美丽的女子？

sentences.english: I'm writing my thesis now about women in the novels of Jin Yong and Gu Long.
sentences.chinese: 我正在写一篇关于金庸和古龙的作品中女侠的论文。

sentences.english: Love theme in JinYong's novels contains much cultural meaning.
sentences.chinese: 金庸小说的爱情主题蕴涵着丰厚的文化内涵。

sentences.english: M green was surprised to find that he has a complete set of jin yongs books.
sentences.chinese: 米青惊奇地发现他居然有金庸的全套书。

definition: Gu Long (1938-1985), Taiwanese wuxia novelist and screenwriter
Legend of the Condor Heroes, wuxia (武侠, martial arts chivalry) novel by Jin Yong 金庸 and its screen adaptations
a martial arts (wuxia) novel
The Return of the Condor Heroes (classic wuxia martial arts TV films of 1998 and 2006 based on novel by Jinyong 金庸)/variant of 神鵰俠侶|神雕侠侣
The Return of the Condor Heroes (classic wuxia martial arts TV films of 1998 and 2006 based on novel by Jinyong 金庸)
Demigods and Semidevils, wuxia novel by Jin Yong 金庸[Jin1 Yong1] and its TV and screen adaptations
Heaven Sword and Dragon Saber, wuxia (武俠|武侠[wu3 xia2], martial arts chivalry) novel by Jin Yong 金庸[Jin1 Yong1] and its screen adaptations
martial arts chivalry (Chinese literary, theatrical and cinema genre)/knight-errant
Ni Kuang (1935-), Chinese novelist and screenwriter

the Four Classic Novels of Chinese literature, namely: A Dream of Red Mansions 紅樓夢|红楼梦[Hong2 lou2 Meng4], Romance of Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4], Water Margin 水滸傳|水浒传[Shui3 hu3 Zhuan4], Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
edge of the water/shore or sea, lake or river/seashore
Chiung Yao (1938-), Taiwanese writer
Water Margin or Outlaws of the Marsh by Shi Nai'an 施耐庵[Shi1 Nai4 an1], one of the Four Classic Novels of Chinese literature
original work (not translation or abridged)
A Dream of Red Mansions (first completed edition 1791) by Cao Xueqin 曹雪芹[Cao2 Xue3 qin2], one of the four great novels
masterpiece
Jinpingmei or the Golden Lotus (1617), Ming dynasty vernacular novel, formerly notorious and banned for its sexual content
